p: In Salé Prefecture, most of the drugs (70.8%) were prepared from fresh substances. The research carried by Abdurrahman [75] registered that 86% of products were in a fresh form, [76] declared that most of (64%) plant species were employed in fresh form and 36% in freeze-dried form. Jima et al., [77] indicated that the preponderance of the drugs (78.6%) were prepared from fresh pieces of plant species. The dependency of herbalists on fresh substances is often due to the effectiveness of fresh plant species in therapy as the ingredients are not lost before practice related to the dried plant forms.
